description: President Trump is switching up his messaging on the economy amid growing concern from voters and even fellow Republicans about his trade agenda. description: President Trump is slated to deliver a commencement address Thursday evening at the University of Alabama. description: For over two decades, Venezuela has been trapped in a slow-motion collapse — economic, social and democratic.
